```{r}
mycsv <- read_csv("C:/Users/Scott Shaw/Desktop/Week4/HDR21-22_Composite_indices_complete_time_series.csv")
```

```{r}
gii_csv <- mycsv %>%
  clean_names() %>%
select(iso3, country, gii_2010, gii_2019)
gii_csv
```

```{r}
gii_country <- gii_csv %>%
  slice(1:195) %>%
  mutate(., gii_diff=(gii_2019-gii_2010))
gii_country
```

```{r}
gii_country_edit <- na.omit(gii_country)
gii_country_edit
```

```{r}
shape <- st_read("World Countries (Generalized)/World_Countries__Generalized_.shp")
```

```{r}
summary(shape)
```

```{r}
library(countrycode)
```

```{r}
gii_country_edit$iso = countrycode(gii_country_edit$iso3,"iso3c","iso2c")
```

```{r}
shape
joined_data <- shape %>% 
  clean_names() %>%
  left_join(., 
            gii_country_edit,
            by = c("iso" = "iso"))
```
